A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This wasn't the film the fandom expected. It doesn't spoon feed you the plot. It doesn't rely on archetype and it inverts tropes. It challenges and confronts Star Wars fans to view the universe a little deeper. It is a fantastic ride with easily the best character development of any film including the original trilogy. Fans confused by what they saw will come around as they have a chance to settle in and understand what Rian was doing.
